NK014(pha)008:0: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du
NK014(pha)008:1: bsnyen pa'i tshul gyi lhan thabs rig 'dzin dga' ston
NK014(pha)008:3: chos nyid zhi las ma g.yos kyang //
NK014(pha)008:5: dbyer med dpal ldan bla ma la //
NK014(pha)008:6: rnam kun dad pas phyag byas te //
NK014(pha)008:8: ma nor gnad kyi man ngag ni //
NK014(pha)008:9: zhal nas snyan du brgyud pa yi //
NK014(pha)008:10: shin tu gsang ba'i yi ge spel //
NK014(pha)008:11: de la 'dir sgyu 'phrul zhi ba'i bsnyen pa sngon du song nas /
NK014(pha)008:12: khro bo'i bsnyen par 'jug par 'dod pa gang dag gis shes par byed pa la gsum /
NK014(pha)008:17: sgrub pa po dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs shing /
NK014(pha)008:18: phyi nang gi dbang thob pa'i rtsa ba dang yan
NK014(pha)008:19: lag gi dam tshig la yang dag par gnas pa'o
NK014(pha)008:20: // gnyis pa lam gyi sngon 'gro dang /
NK014(pha)008:22: rjes kyi rim pa gsum sgyu 'phrul zhi ba'i bsnyen yig las ji skad bshad pa ltar las /
NK014(pha)008:23: 'dir ni khro bo'i sgos chos nye bar mkho ba 'ga' zhig brjod par bya'o //
NK014(pha)008:24: de yang gnas dur khrod dang ri bo dben pa gsungs kyang /
NK014(pha)008:25: zhi khro gnyis te bsnyen pa btang na /
NK014(pha)008:26: zhi ba'i bsnyen pa btang ba'i gnas las gzhan mi dgos la /
NK014(pha)008:27: bla ma gong ma'i zhal rgyun la /
NK014(pha)008:29: khro bo gnas gyur du sgrub pa yin pas /
NK014(pha)008:30: dang po zhi ba'i bsnyen pa rgyas pa'am /
NK014(pha)008:31: las rung tsam sngon du ma song na /
NK014(pha)008:32: khro bo sgrub pa 'tshubs che zhing 'chun dka' bar gsungs pa bzhin /
NK014(pha)008:33: 'dir yang zhi bsnyen sngon du song ba'i gang zag gis khro bor yang bsnyen pa btang na /
NK014(pha)008:34: rgyud sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba chen po'i rgyud don gyi gnad ma tshang ba med pa lags pas /
NK014(pha)008:35: dus yun 'khor ba tsam gyis le lo dang snyoms las spangs te /
NK014(pha)008:36: zhi khro gnyis ka la bsnyen pa zhig btang na /
NK014(pha)008:37: dal 'byor gyi lus rten lan cig rnyed pa la
NK014(pha)008:38: snying po legs par lon pa yin pas dga' spro
NK014(pha)008:39: dang bcas pas 'jug par rigs so //
NK014(pha)008:40: de yang phyi nang gi mchod gtor sogs mkho ba'i yo byad rnams tshogs par byas nas /
NK014(pha)008:41: gza' skar legs par phyi dro dbang gi dus mtshams
NK014(pha)008:42: kyi dbu 'dzugs sogs zhi ba'i bsnyen yig ji lta
NK014(pha)008:43: ba bzhin las / 'dir ni sgos chos mtshams bcad kyi skabs su /
NK014(pha)008:44: mtshams kyi bcad tshul gyi go don la khro bcu 'bar ba mtshams kyi rgyud las /
NK014(pha)008:45: sngon de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byung gi rgyal po'i bstan pa la /
NK014(pha)008:47: dbyings ma zhes bya ba'i pha ma gnyis la bu brgyad byung /
NK014(pha)008:48: de dag la chung ma brgyad bsus /
NK014(pha)008:49: de'i tshe mu ge chen po zhig byung bas de
NK014(pha)008:50: dag gis mi dge bcu spang gi sdom pa blangs
NK014(pha)008:51: te thugs ji ltar bskyed pa la ma 'ongs pa'i
NK014(pha)008:52: gang zag rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis dngos grub
NK014(pha)008:53: sgrub pa'i bar chad srung zhing mchog thun mong gi
NK014(pha)008:54: dngos grub sbyin par smon lam btab pas /
NK014(pha)008:55: de dag tshe 'phos te phyi ma la 'og min
NK014(pha)008:56: gyi zhing du rdo rje mi bskyood pa'i sras su
NK014(pha)008:57: gyur nas pha ma gnyis steng 'og gi khro bo
NK014(pha)008:58: gnyis dang / bu brgyad chung mar bcas pas phyogs
NK014(pha)008:59: mtshams kyi khro bo brgyad du sangs rgyas pa'i thugs
NK014(pha)008:60: bskyed dang smon lam yang dag pa'i mthus /
NK014(pha)008:61: da lta sgrub pa gang la yang khro bo bcu'i
NK014(pha)008:62: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom na mi 'thad pa med
NK014(pha)008:63: cing / khyad par rten gzhal yas khang gi khro
NK014(pha)008:64: bo gang yin kyang gtsug tor 'khor lo'i sgyur ba'i
NK014(pha)008:65: sa bon b+h+r+aum las bskyed dgos pa de dag gis
NK014(pha)008:66: cing / yin cing / dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang
NK014(pha)008:67: gi rtsig pa dang b+h+r+aum gyi yi ge de dag
NK014(pha)008:68: sbyor du 'chad pa ni phyogs re byed pa'o //
NK014(pha)008:69: 'di la spyi dang bye brag gnyis las /
NK014(pha)008:71: khro bcu 'bar ba mtshams kyi rgyud las bstan pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:72: rang nyid khro bo gnod mdzes rdo rje tho ba dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa gsal zhing /
NK014(pha)008:74: sam ha ra na h'u gis /
NK014(pha)008:75: thugs ka nas ma dmar po zhig 'phros /
NK014(pha)008:76: ma sur+ya man+dala zhes pas nyi ma'i gdan du gyur nas /
NK014(pha)008:77: sh+r+ai badz+ra h'u k+aa ra badz+ra man+dala la h'u phata /
NK014(pha)008:78: ces pas sngags kyis rkyen gyis khro bo h'u k+aa ra gsal ba ni /
NK014(pha)008:80: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
NK014(pha)008:81: dbyar gyi char sprin lta bu'i mdog /
NK014(pha)008:82: bskal pa'i me dpung bzhin du 'bar //
NK014(pha)008:83: dor stabs tshul du zhabs bsgrad cing //
NK014(pha)008:84: smin mtshams khro gnyer 'bar ba can //
NK014(pha)008:85: zhal gsum mche gtsigs rnam par 'gyur //
NK014(pha)008:86: phyag gnyis h'u gis rgya bcing nas //
NK014(pha)008:87: rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang //
NK014(pha)008:88: g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri dang //
NK014(pha)008:89: g.yon gnyis dgra s+t+wa zhags pa bsnams //
NK014(pha)008:91: rang gi de la bka' stsal to //
NK014(pha)008:93: h'u bzhi'i sngags dang bcas pa brjod pas /
NK014(pha)008:94: gnod mdzes kyi h'u k+aa ra la phyogs bcur khro bo'i gdan shom zhig ces bka' stsal nas /
NK014(pha)008:95: thugs ka nas tho ba dang lcags kyu thogs nas gtad /
NK014(pha)008:96: de nas h'u k+aa ras zhal nas sh+r+ai tak+ki r+aa dza badz+ra ma h+aa kro ta h'u phata /
NK014(pha)008:97: ces brjod pas bskul bas khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngo skya g.yas dkar g.yon dmar //
NK014(pha)008:98: phyag dang po gnyis rang gi phyag rgya bcing ba /
NK014(pha)008:99: bar pa lcags kyu dang zhags pa /
NK014(pha)008:101: g.yon tha ma nyi ma'i gdan bsnams pa la /
NK014(pha)008:102: yang h'u k+aa ras ma sur+ya man+da la zhes dang /
NK014(pha)008:104: khro bo bcu'i gdan shom zhig ces bka' bsgo ba dang mnyam du /
NK014(pha)008:105: 'dod rgyal gyi thugs ka nas ma bcu phyogs bcur spros te nyi gdan gsal ba la /
NK014(pha)008:106: de nas h'u k+aa ra'i zhal nas /
NK014(pha)008:108: khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dag ni //
NK014(pha)008:109: bgegs kyi tshogs kun kun nas bshigs //
NK014(pha)008:110: blo ldan rab tu sbyar ba yi //
NK014(pha)008:111: cho ga bzhin du phur bus gdab //
NK014(pha)008:113: 'dod rgyal gyi phyag tu h'u k+aa ras tho ba dang lcags kyu gtad pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:115: phyogs skyong bcu lcags kyus bzung tho bas brdung nas nyil gyis btang nas /
NK014(pha)008:116: phyogs bcur nyi ma'i steng du pho mo bsnol nas bzhag ste /
NK014(pha)008:117: khro bo spyan 'dren pa'i tshig 'dod rgyal gyis 'di skad brjod par mos te /
NK014(pha)008:119: gdan bting lags so khro rgyal tshogs //
NK014(pha)008:120: zhe sdang rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor nas //
NK014(pha)008:121: khro chen rngam brjid sprul pa'i sku //
NK014(pha)008:122: nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
NK014(pha)008:123: ces pas khro bo bcu spyan drangs te /
NK014(pha)008:124: de nas 'dod pa'i rgyal po h'u k+aa ra la thim /
NK014(pha)008:125: de nas h'u k+aa ras h'u bcu brjod nas /
NK014(pha)008:127: khro bo bcu dag byung nas ni //
NK014(pha)008:128: h'u las bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i gdan //
NK014(pha)008:129: smad ni rtse mo'i rnam par bsam //
NK014(pha)008:130: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor phyogs rnams su //
NK014(pha)008:131: rim pa bzhin du kun tu 'khod //
NK014(pha)008:132: bgegs rnams thams cad bshig pa'i phyir //
NK014(pha)008:133: gnod mdzes bka' rtsal phur pas btab //
NK014(pha)008:134: g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya sogs zhes bskul zhing /
NK014(pha)008:136: tho ba phyag na bsnams pa'i mchog /
NK014(pha)008:137: gnod mdzes rgyal po'i rnam par bsam //
NK014(pha)008:138: h'u brjod 'bar ba blta ba yis //
NK014(pha)008:139: bgegs kyi tshogs rnams bshig pa'i phyir //
NK014(pha)008:140: gnod mdzes bka' stsal phur bus thob //
NK014(pha)008:141: g+ha ta ya zhes brjod cing /
NK014(pha)008:144: khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed bcu /
NK014(pha)008:145: rdo rje phur bu nyid gnas pa //
NK014(pha)008:148: lte ba man chad chas rnams ni //
NK014(pha)008:149: rtse mo phur bu'i rnam pa la //
NK014(pha)008:150: sku stod khro bo chen po ste //
NK014(pha)008:151: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //
NK014(pha)008:152: bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'og tu gzir //
NK014(pha)008:153: de yi sngags ni brjod byas nas //
NK014(pha)008:154: rdo rje phur bu nges btab na //
NK014(pha)008:155: bgegs lus shin tu mi gayo'o //
NK014(pha)008:156: badz+ra kro ta h'u k+aa ra h'u gardza gardza h'u phata sogs khro bo bcu'i sngags dang /
NK014(pha)008:157: g+ha ta ya zhes brjod nas /
NK014(pha)008:158: khro bo rnams rim pa bzhin phyogs bcu'i phyogs skyong rnams kyi snying gar babs pas /
NK014(pha)008:159: lus phug ste 'og gi nyi ma'i gdan la sbrags par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)008:160: de ltar btab pa'i dgos pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:161: rgyal po btson du bzungs na dmangs cham la 'bebs pa ltar /
NK014(pha)008:162: bgegs kyi gtso bo phyogs skyong bcu la phur pa
NK014(pha)008:163: btab pas bgegs phran gzhan ldang mi nus par 'gyur
NK014(pha)008:164: ba'o // 'chad tshul gzhan du 'dod pa'i rgyal pos gdan bting nas /
NK014(pha)008:165: h'u k+aa ra la thim pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:166: 'og gi khro bo gnod mdzes tho ba dang sdig mdzub can gyi rnam par thon nas /
NK014(pha)008:167: h'u k+aa ras sked par sdigs mdzub kyis brdungs te
NK014(pha)008:168: steng phyogs tshangs pa'i gdan du tho bas btab par
NK014(pha)008:169: bsam zhing rim par steng dang phyogs mtshams rnams btab
NK014(pha)008:170: zin pa na / tho ba h'u k+aa ra'i phyag
NK014(pha)008:171: tu gtad nas de'i gnod mdzes 'og gis bdag gi
NK014(pha)008:172: gdan la btab pa'i gsung rgyun snang bas gang ltar
NK014(pha)008:173: zin pa na / btab kyang chog / de nas
NK014(pha)008:174: yang rang gi thugs ka nas mtshon cha sna tshogs
NK014(pha)008:175: pa'i char 'phros te srid pa gsum gyi bgegs bcom
NK014(pha)008:176: zin pa na / btab kyang chog / ste /
NK014(pha)008:177: tshur 'dus pas khro bo rnams kyi phyi rol du
NK014(pha)008:178: mtshon cha'i gur dang ra bar gyur par bsam pa'o
NK014(pha)008:179: zin pa na / btab kyang chog / ste / // gnyis pa bye brag tu /
NK014(pha)008:182: mtshan bcas kyi mtshams gnyis las /
NK014(pha)008:184: lta pa dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med du nges
NK014(pha)008:185: pas tha mal gyi bden 'dzin rang bzhin med par
NK014(pha)008:186: rtogs pa ni mtshams gcod thams cad kyi rgyal po
NK014(pha)008:187: yin la / gnyis pa mtshan bcas kyi mtshams gcod ni /
NK014(pha)008:188: stong pa nyid de'i ngang las pad nyi la gnas
NK014(pha)008:189: pa'i h'u las sna tshogs rdo rje h'u yig gis
NK014(pha)008:191: rdo rje'i sa gzhi ra ba d+r+wa gur bla bre'i
NK014(pha)008:192: phyi rol du bskal pa'i me dpung rab tu 'bar
NK014(pha)008:193: bas bskor ba'i dbus su b+h+r+aum las 'khor lo ser
NK014(pha)008:194: po mtshon cha'i rtsibs can cha lang kha sbyar ba
NK014(pha)008:195: lta bu'i steng 'og gi rtsibs gnyis mdung rtse ltar
NK014(pha)008:196: steng 'og gi rdo rje'i bla re dang sa gzhi
NK014(pha)008:197: gnyis la zug pa phyogs mtshams kyi rtsibs brgyad sbubs
NK014(pha)008:198: stong gi rnam pa rtse mo rno ba'i dbal dang
NK014(pha)008:200: khog pa stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par gsungs pa la /
NK014(pha)008:202: srung ba'i 'khor lo rang gi gnas kyi gnam sa
NK014(pha)008:203: 'byar bar snang ba tshun chod du bsgom pa zhal
NK014(pha)008:204: shes yin pas 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su pad
NK014(pha)008:205: nyi la gnas pa'i h'u sngon po 'bar bar gyur
NK014(pha)008:206: pa de las 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas thams cad
NK014(pha)008:208: gcig tu 'dus nas h'u la zhugs pas /
NK014(pha)008:209: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka zhes brjod pa'i
NK014(pha)008:210: rkyen gyis bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje yab yum
NK014(pha)008:211: gyi skur gsal ba'i de'i thugs ka'i h'u las ma
NK014(pha)008:212: bcu 'phros pas rtsibs rnams kyi nang du nyi gdan
NK014(pha)008:213: bcur gyur / slar rang gi thugs ka nas khro
NK014(pha)008:214: bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po 'phros te phyogs bcu'i bgegs
NK014(pha)008:215: rnams bkug ste nyi gdan gyi steng du smyos shing
NK014(pha)008:217: zhal nas h'u bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu'i sngags brjod de khro bcu'i gdan bting ba'i steng du /
NK014(pha)008:218: bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs ka nas h'u yig bcu 'phros so so'i gdan la 'khod par /
NK014(pha)008:219: badz+ra kro d+ha h'u ka ra h'u gardza gardza h'u
NK014(pha)008:220: phata sogs khro bo bcu'i sngags brjod pa'i rkyen gyis
NK014(pha)008:221: / h'u yig bcu po rim pa bzhin /
NK014(pha)008:222: h'u mdzad la sogs pa khro bo bcu gyur te /
NK014(pha)008:223: thams cad kyang sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa tho ba dang /
NK014(pha)008:224: lcags kyu 'dzin pa sku smad phur bu 'bar ba'i rnam pa can du gyur par bsam zhing /
NK014(pha)008:225: de nas khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba tho ba thogs pa rang gi thugs ka nas thon te /
NK014(pha)008:226: g+ha g+ha g+ha ta sogs brjod bzhin pas /
NK014(pha)008:227: khro bo rnams kyi rked pa nas sdigs mdzub kyis bsnams te phur bu'i tshul du /
NK014(pha)008:228: phyogs bcu'i bgegs so sor steng gi khro bo nas rim par /
NK014(pha)008:229: tho bas lan gsum du btab pas bgegs rnams kyi lus 'gul mi shes /
NK014(pha)008:231: sems kyi dran pa nyams te chos nyid du brgyal
NK014(pha)008:232: bar bsam te bgegs rnams g.yo 'gul med par byas
NK014(pha)008:233: te / slar yang khro bo de rnams las sprul
NK014(pha)008:234: pa dang yang sprul mtshon cha sna tshogs dang bcas
NK014(pha)008:235: pa'i 'od zer rnon po 'khrugs shing 'bar ba srung
NK014(pha)008:236: ba'i 'khor los phyogs kun gtams te cis kyang mi
NK014(pha)008:238: 'di ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo gsal ba 'di thun
NK014(pha)008:239: re re bzhin ngag gi brjod tshig rgyas bsdus la
NK014(pha)008:240: ma ltos par yid kyis gsal btab ste mtshams ma
NK014(pha)008:242: de nas bshags pa sogs dkyus bzhin btang /
NK014(pha)008:243: thun phyi ma gsum la rgyud sbyang yan lag bdun
NK014(pha)008:244: pa dang sems bskyed gnyis las gzhan rnams bzhag na
NK014(pha)008:246: gnyis pa dngos gzhi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa la
NK014(pha)008:247: khyad par gyi sbyor ba dgos ched kyi sgo nas
NK014(pha)008:248: sems bskyed pa ni thabs bskyed pa'i rim pa ji
NK014(pha)008:249: snyed pa theg pa chen po'i lam du gyur pa'i
NK014(pha)008:251: spyir sems can thams cad ye nas sems nyid rang bzhin rnam dag gi sangs rgyas yin pa la /
NK014(pha)008:252: de ltar ma rtogs nas med snang 'khrul pas bslus
NK014(pha)008:253: pa la snying rje chen po rtsol med du shar
NK014(pha)008:254: ba'i sgo nas / 'khrul ba'i sems can rnams rang gnas kyi ye shes /
NK014(pha)008:255: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa /
NK014(pha)008:256: lhag pa'i dkor bdun ngo bo nyid lhun gyis grub
NK014(pha)008:257: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'god par 'dod pa
NK014(pha)008:258: dang / khyad par du khro bo'i sgos chos /
NK014(pha)008:259: sngon gyi gleng gzhi dang mthun par sems bskyed pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:260: de bzhin gshegs pa gdug pa can gyi yul la
NK014(pha)008:261: thugs rje chen po cher khros nas 'dul bar mdzad
NK014(pha)008:263: shin tu gdug cing gtum pa'i 'gro ba rnams la
NK014(pha)008:264: rjes su chags pa'i snying rje chen po rdo rje
NK014(pha)008:265: khro bo'i sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi
NK014(pha)008:266: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi go 'phang bdag gis sgrubs
NK014(pha)008:267: nas / log par rtog pa'i dbang gis gdul zhing
NK014(pha)008:268: dbang med du 'khor ba'i sems can rnams sangs rgyas
NK014(pha)008:270: 'dzin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal zhing //
NK014(pha)008:271: gdug pa srid gsum 'dul ba dang //
NK014(pha)008:272: nga rgyal chen po bstan pa'i phyir //
NK014(pha)008:274: zhes sngon de bzhin gshegs pas ru tra gdug pa
NK014(pha)008:275: can 'khor dang bcas pa thabs la mkhas pas btul
NK014(pha)008:276: zhing rgyud sbyangs nas yang dag pa'i lam la 'god
NK014(pha)008:277: pa de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed par
NK014(pha)008:278: bya'o snyam du dam bca' zhing sems bskyed pa la
NK014(pha)008:279: do gal bya'o // gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK014(pha)008:280: rim pa dngos la ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi khog
NK014(pha)008:281: do gal bya'o // dbub pa / bdag sras dang
NK014(pha)008:282: gzhan sras kyi sgo nas rten dang brten pa'i dkyil
NK014(pha)008:283: do gal bya'o // dbub pa / 'khor bskyed pa
NK014(pha)008:284: / las kyi rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum las
NK014(pha)008:285: do gal bya'o // dbub pa / 'khor bskyed pa / / dang po la'ang gsum ste /
NK014(pha)008:286: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin /
NK014(pha)008:287: kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin /
NK014(pha)008:288: rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin dang gsum ni snga 'gyur
NK014(pha)008:289: rnying ma'i chos skad thun mong ma yin pa yin
NK014(pha)008:290: pas / gzhan lugs la ye shes kyi tshogs bsags
NK014(pha)008:291: kyi rjes su bar srid lhar bskyed pa las mi
NK014(pha)008:292: pas / 'byung la / 'dir ni stong nyid snying
NK014(pha)008:293: rje snying po can gyis 'phen pas sprul pa'i lha
NK014(pha)008:294: sku zhal phyag gi rnam par bzhengs nas /
NK014(pha)008:295: phrin las rnam pa bzhis gzhan phan sgrub pa ni
NK014(pha)008:296: tshogs gnyis zung du 'jug pa'i theg chen gyi lam
NK014(pha)008:298: mar ma dag 'khor ba'i dus na yang skye gnas
NK014(pha)008:299: gang du 'phen byed kyi las de sred len gyi
NK014(pha)008:300: gsos ma btab na mngal du 'jug mi nus pas
NK014(pha)008:301: / sred len gyis gsos btab nas 'jug pa ltar /
NK014(pha)008:302: 'dir yang thugs rje chen po'i 'phen pas gsos btab
NK014(pha)008:303: pa 'od gsal stong nyid kyi ngang las dkyil 'khor
NK014(pha)008:304: gyi lha'i skye bar 'dzin pas mar sbyangs bya mthun
NK014(pha)008:305: / mthar thug gi 'bras bu'i gnas skabs na yang /
NK014(pha)008:306: rtog pa dang bral ba'i thugs rje chen pos chos sku'i ngang las gzugs skur bzhengs nas /
NK014(pha)008:307: nam mkha'i mtha' khyab kyi don mdzad pa dang chos mthun /
NK014(pha)008:308: stong nyid snying rje'i rtsal dang ma bral bas bskyed rim rang rgyud du gol mi srid cing /
NK014(pha)008:309: lam nges rdzogs ltar bsgom nas de bzhin nyid kyi
NK014(pha)008:310: ting nge 'dzin la brtan pa thob par bya ba
NK014(pha)008:311: ni bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug tu 'gyur zhing /
NK014(pha)008:312: slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis bzhed pa'i
NK014(pha)008:313: zab gsal gnyis med kyi rdzogs rim mtshan nyid pa
NK014(pha)008:315: slob dpon gyis bzhed pa bskyed rim la rdzogs rim gyis rgyas btab nas bsgom pa zhes gsungs so //
NK014(pha)008:316: 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gsum po yang lam
NK014(pha)008:317: nges rdzogs ltar bsgom na shes bya lta ba'i de
NK014(pha)008:318: nyid ngo sprod dang gtan tshigs la brten nas yid
NK014(pha)008:320: mthong ba'i chos la 'jog pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:321: rig pa spyi blugs su 'jog pa'i thabs gang rung
NK014(pha)008:322: gis sems ma bcos spros bral rang babs su lhod
NK014(pha)008:323: kyis lhod la dran rtog gi 'gyu ba'i yun thag
NK014(pha)008:324: bcad de / bying rgod kyi rta skyon dang bral bar bzhag cing /
NK014(pha)008:325: 'jog tshul sems grim lhod snyoms par rtse gcig tu bzhag /
NK014(pha)008:326: shes pa khong lhod la bzhag /
NK014(pha)008:327: 'dzin stangs kyi ngar cha mi lhod par bzhag /
NK014(pha)008:328: ngar cha shor na yang sems grims su btang la
NK014(pha)008:329: bzhag pa sogs sems gnas pa'i thabs bsgrub tshul sgyu
NK014(pha)008:330: 'phrul zhi ba'i bsnyen yig ltar 'dir blangs te nyams
NK014(pha)008:332: zhi ba'i skabs nas bsam gtan 'grub zin na 'dir
NK014(pha)008:333: sa bcad re re nas thun cha shas las yun
NK014(pha)008:335: de nyid goms pas rlung sems dbu mar 'dus te rtags bcu'i mthong snang rdzogs shing /
NK014(pha)008:336: gang zag dbang rab kyis snang gsum brten pa'i dpe'i ye shes kyang bskyed nus /
NK014(pha)008:337: de ltar min kyang stong nyid spros dang bral ba'i
NK014(pha)008:338: go yul dang ma bral ba'i sems gnas la brtan
NK014(pha)008:339: pa thob tshe med bzhin du snang ba'i 'khor ba
NK014(pha)008:340: la bltas nas 'dzin med sgyu ma lta bu'i snying
NK014(pha)008:341: rje mkha' khyab tu bsgom pa la snying rjes dang
NK014(pha)008:342: snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la blo sbyang /
NK014(pha)008:343: de nyid goms pas stong nyid la blo bzhag tshe snying rje'i rtsi dang ma bral ba /
NK014(pha)008:344: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i sems can med snang 'khrul
NK014(pha)008:345: pas bslus pa la snying rje rtsol med du skye
NK014(pha)008:346: zhing / snying rje bsgom kyang stong nyid kyi rtsi
NK014(pha)008:347: dang ma bral ba bdag gzhan a 'thas su mi
NK014(pha)008:348: gol zhing rten 'brel rang bzhin med pa sgyu ma
NK014(pha)008:349: lta bu'i snang ba las don du rang bzhin ma
NK014(pha)008:350: grub pa'i stong nyid kyi nges shes skyes pa na
NK014(pha)008:351: stong nyid snying rje snying po can la goms par
NK014(pha)008:352: zhing / bya ba ni / de bzhin nyid dang /
NK014(pha)008:353: kun snang gnyis ka'i don yin pas /
NK014(pha)008:354: lam 'di gnyis ya ma bral bar nyams su blang dgos pas /
NK014(pha)008:355: gzhung gi de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin /
NK014(pha)008:356: e ma hoh ngo mtshar sogs brjod nas de la blo 'jog tshul gong du bshad pa ltar 'jog /
NK014(pha)008:357: de goms nas kun snang gi ting nge 'dzin /
NK014(pha)008:358: e ma hoh kun tu bzang po ni sogs brjod de /
NK014(pha)008:359: kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom /
NK014(pha)008:360: de gnyis re re ya bral du bsgom pas rdzogs
NK014(pha)008:361: pa'i byang chub sgrub mi nus na gnyis ka dang
NK014(pha)008:362: bral bas lta ci smos te /
NK014(pha)008:363: grub brgya'i spyi mes sa ra has /
NK014(pha)008:364: snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid lta ba //
NK014(pha)008:365: des ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin te //
NK014(pha)008:366: gal te snying rje 'ba' zhig bsgom na yang //
NK014(pha)008:367: 'khor ba 'dir gnas thar pa yod dam ci //
NK014(pha)008:368: gang gi gnyis po sbyor ba nus pa ni //
NK014(pha)008:369: srid par mi gnas mya ngan 'das mi gnas //
NK014(pha)008:370: zhes shes rab kyi srid rtsa bden par 'dzin pa'i log rtog bcad nas srid par mi gnas shing /
NK014(pha)008:371: snying rjes bdag 'dod yid byed kyi 'dzin pa bcad
NK014(pha)008:372: nas zhi ba nyan rang gi mtha' la mi gnas
NK014(pha)008:374: shes pas srid pa mi gnas shing //
NK014(pha)008:375: snying rje zhi la mi gnas pa //
NK014(pha)008:377: mi gnas khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)008:378: zhes pa bzhin stong nyid snying rje snying po can
NK014(pha)008:379: gyi rgyal sras spyi'i lam chen yin pas nam yang
NK014(pha)008:380: ting nge 'dzin gsum ya ma bral ba bsgom pa
NK014(pha)008:381: shin tu gsang ba'i zab mo'i gnad khyad par du
NK014(pha)008:385: rnam pa rgyu'i yi ge zhi khro gang yang rung ba'i sa bon du gsal bas /
NK014(pha)008:386: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rten brten par bcas pa
NK014(pha)008:387: stong nyid dang snying rje zung du 'jug pa las
NK014(pha)008:388: bskyed pa rten 'brel du rang bzhin med pa'i 'char
NK014(pha)008:389: tshul du gnad gal che bas /
NK014(pha)008:390: de lta bu'i stong nyid snying rje snying po can
NK014(pha)008:391: gyi rtsal snang rgyu'i sa bon gang yang rung ba
NK014(pha)008:393: nges pa las ni rdo rje che //
NK014(pha)008:394: de las dpal chen he ru ka /
NK014(pha)008:395: 'bar ba chen po'i gar dgu yis //
NK014(pha)008:396: 'jigs pa yi ni dus ltar drag /
NK014(pha)008:397: zhes rang rig snang stong gnyis su med pa'i rang
NK014(pha)008:398: bzhin h'u yig mthing nag tu gsal zhing 'bar bar
NK014(pha)008:399: gyur pa la sems bzung la bsgom /
NK014(pha)008:400: de brtan pa na 'od zer spro bsdus don gnyis
NK014(pha)008:401: byas nas gnam lcags kyi rdo rje sngon po rtse
NK014(pha)008:402: dgu par bsgom pa sogs la sems gnas sgrub tshul
NK014(pha)008:404: de nyid goms nas ci tsam 'dod kyi bar du
NK014(pha)008:405: mnyam par bzhag nus pa'i skabs su gzod yig 'bru
NK014(pha)008:406: de la de 'dra grangs med pa spros te nam
NK014(pha)008:408: slar yang yig 'bru de nyid la bsdus te mnyam
NK014(pha)008:409: par 'jog pa sogs la gsal brtan gyi tshad brgyad
NK014(pha)008:410: ma thob kyi bar du bslab pa ni phra ba
NK014(pha)008:411: yig 'bru la bslab pa zhes bya ste /
NK014(pha)008:412: 'di kho na goms pas kyang thun mong gi dngos
NK014(pha)008:413: grub dang grub rtags ci 'dod par sgrub nus pas
NK014(pha)008:414: / de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum po lam nges
NK014(pha)008:415: rdzogs kyi dbang du na bskyed rim rgyas pa bdag
NK014(pha)008:417: 'bring po mngon byang lnga bskyed dang bzhi bskyed /
NK014(pha)008:418: bsdus pa rdo rje cho ga gsum bskyed sogs gang bsgom pa la med na thabs chag cing /
NK014(pha)008:419: yod na des chog gi ting nge 'dzin yin pas 'di la blo sbyang bar goms pa gces so //
NK014(pha)008:420: de ltar nges rdzogs tsam ma byung kyang /
NK014(pha)008:421: mos bsgom du byed tshe yang thun thams cad kyi
NK014(pha)008:422: mgor tshig tsam gyis chog shes mi bya bar cho
NK014(pha)008:423: ga'i yan lag rnams rdzogs pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:425: de ting nge 'dzin dang kun snang la /
NK014(pha)008:426: sems ma zin gyi bar du mnyam par bzhag /
NK014(pha)008:427: de nas rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin sogs rim pa ltar
NK014(pha)008:428: bsgom zhing nyams len gyi gtso bo stong nyid snying
NK014(pha)008:429: rje dang ma bral ba'i bskyed rim ma brtan gyi
NK014(pha)008:430: bar du bzlas pa dang spro bsdu sogs la do
NK014(pha)008:431: gal mi byed / mos bsgom dang nges rdzogs gang
NK014(pha)008:432: ltar bsgom kyang bskyed rim gyi skabs thams cad du
NK014(pha)008:433: ting nge 'dzin gsum ya ma bral bar bsgom pa
NK014(pha)008:435: de yang dper na rtsig ngor ri mo byed pa'i tshe rtsig pa ni gzhi yin pas /
NK014(pha)008:436: de med na ri mo gang la byed /
NK014(pha)008:437: rtsig pa yod kyang zhal la med na rtsig ngor
NK014(pha)008:438: ri mo 'bri mi nus pas zhal la ni ri
NK014(pha)008:439: mo dang rtsig pa lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin
NK014(pha)008:440: la / ri mo bris zin pa'i skabs na yang
NK014(pha)008:441: rtsig pa dang ri mo zhal la bcas pa phun
NK014(pha)008:442: sum tshogs pa yod pa ltar /
NK014(pha)008:443: rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor gyi
NK014(pha)008:444: 'khor lo rdzogs par bsgom pa'i gnas skabs na yang
NK014(pha)008:445: stong nyid snying rje'i rtsal snang lhar shar bas gsum
NK014(pha)008:446: ka ya ma bral bar yod dgos te /
NK014(pha)008:447: rgyu mtshan ci'i phyir snyam na /
NK014(pha)008:448: tha mal gyi snang ba stong nyid du ma dag na dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gang du bsgom /
NK014(pha)008:449: des na chos thams cad stong pa nyid yin pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:450: 'khor 'das dbyer med yin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis dkyil
NK014(pha)008:451: 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom nas mngon du byed nus
NK014(pha)008:452: pa yin zhing / stong nyid ni bskyed rim gyi gzhi yin te /
NK014(pha)008:454: gang la stong pa nyid rung ba //
NK014(pha)008:455: de la thams cad rung bar 'gyur //
NK014(pha)008:456: zhes pa bzhin chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma
NK014(pha)008:457: yin zhing tha mal gyi snang ba bden par grub
NK014(pha)008:458: na ni bskyed rim bsgom mi nus te /
NK014(pha)008:460: gro sran 'bras bu dbang bskur yang //
NK014(pha)008:461: de la 'bras kyi dngos snang med //
NK014(pha)008:463: ye nas bden gnyis dbyer med dag mnyam chen por gnas pa la /
NK014(pha)008:464: blo 'khrul pas gnas snang mi mthun par bzung ste /
NK014(pha)008:465: log rtog bden par zhen pas tha mal gyi snang
NK014(pha)008:466: ba 'di la bden bden grub grub ltar zhen pa'i
NK014(pha)008:468: yul rang gi steng na bden pa grub pa'i rang
NK014(pha)008:469: mtshan gyis grub pa cung zad kyang med pas snang
NK014(pha)008:470: ba 'di blos phar btags pa'i 'khrul pa med pa
NK014(pha)008:471: gsal snang nyag gcig tu 'jog par 'dus pa mdo'i
NK014(pha)008:473: nga gcig par gsungs pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:474: ngang bsgom gyi rnal 'byor chen po yan chad du
NK014(pha)008:475: kun rdzob btags yod 'ba' zhig par gsungs pa dang
NK014(pha)008:476: / sgyu 'phrul gyi le'u gsum pa nas /
NK014(pha)008:477: log rtog nyid la nyid spyod pas //
NK014(pha)008:478: log rtog sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo //
NK014(pha)008:479: zhes sogs kyis gsal ba dang rgyas par bstan par ltar ro //
NK014(pha)008:480: de nas chos thams cad stong nyid du shes kyang
NK014(pha)008:481: snying rje chen po'i 'phen pa dang bral ba ni
NK014(pha)008:482: gzhan don du gzugs kyi sku bzhengs mi nus te
NK014(pha)008:483: nyan rang 'gog par zhugs pa la gzugs sku'i 'gro
NK014(pha)008:484: don mdzad pa mi 'byung ba bzhin yin pas /
NK014(pha)008:485: rgyu bskyed rim gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa la stong
NK014(pha)008:486: nyid snying rje gnyis gal che bar ma zad 'bras
NK014(pha)008:487: bu chos kyi sku las gzugs kyis skur bzhengs pa
NK014(pha)008:488: la med du mi rung bas ting nge 'dzin gsum
NK014(pha)008:489: po gal che bas rgyas par bshad pa'o //
NK014(pha)008:490: gnyis pa rten gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:491: brten pa lha bsgom pa gnyis kyi rten brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa la /
NK014(pha)008:492: snga 'gyur ba rang lugs la skye gnas bzhi'i bag
NK014(pha)008:493: chags sbyang ba lam bskyed rim bsgom tshul la'ang bzhi
NK014(pha)008:495: skye gnas bzhi po dag bya'i phyir //
NK014(pha)008:496: bskyed pa'ang de ni rnam pa bzhi /
NK014(pha)008:497: spros bcas spros dang spros pa med //
NK014(pha)008:498: shin tu spros pa med pa bzhi'o //
NK014(pha)008:499: zhes 'khor ba'i 'dra 'bag skye gnas rnam pa bzhi'i
NK014(pha)008:500: bag chags sbyong ba la ltos te bskyed tshul rnam
NK014(pha)008:501: pa bzhir bstan pa'i dang po sgong skyes kyi bag
NK014(pha)008:502: chags sbyong ba rgyas pa chen po bdag sras gzhan
NK014(pha)008:503: sras rnam pa gnyis kyi sgo nas bskyed tshul yang
NK014(pha)008:504: / deng sang khro bo dang bka' brgyad gnyis la sbyar tshul zhig yod pa las /
NK014(pha)008:505: sgyu 'phrul zhi ba la bdag sras dang gzhan sras
NK014(pha)008:506: kyi bskyed tshul gyi go ba zhig kyang chags mi
NK014(pha)008:507: snang bas / zhi bar sbyar ba'i tshul sgyu 'phrul las /
NK014(pha)008:508: rang byung dngos dang mi 'gal zhing //
NK014(pha)008:509: 'bras bu nyid la lam shes pas //
NK014(pha)008:510: ma lus dkyil 'khor thig le rnams //
NK014(pha)008:511: bdag gi sras su bsgom par bya //
NK014(pha)008:514: ji ltar sangs rgyas mthu las byung //
NK014(pha)008:515: lhun gyis grub pa'i cho ga dang //
NK014(pha)008:516: cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs pa la //
NK014(pha)008:517: mkhas pa sangs rgyas sras yin no //
NK014(pha)008:520: gang gis gang la gsol btab pas /
NK014(pha)008:521: thugs rje byin brlabs sbyang byas nas //
NK014(pha)008:522: thugs zhugs 'dres par dbyer med na //
NK014(pha)008:523: sras gyur dgongs pa ci la gnas //
NK014(pha)008:525: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba chen po rang gi rgyud kyis
NK014(pha)008:526: dngos bstan gyis zhi ba la rgyas par sbyar yod
NK014(pha)008:527: mod kyang / 'dir ni sgyu 'phrul khro bo dang sbyar nas 'chad pa skabs su babs pas /
NK014(pha)008:528: bdag sras dang gzhan sras zhes pa'i don ni /
NK014(pha)008:529: de'ang thog mar sgo nga de las gzugs su smin
NK014(pha)008:530: pa ltar gnyis kyi srid pa'i bag chags sbyong ba'i
NK014(pha)008:531: gnyen po'i khyad par bdag sras gzhan sras kyi rnam
NK014(pha)008:532: pas bstan pa'i dang po bskyed gzhi dbang du na
NK014(pha)008:533: / bskyed gzhi bdag gi chos nyid bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po /
NK014(pha)008:534: rgyu'i rdo rje'i 'dzin pa'i rnam par gsal bas /
NK014(pha)008:535: gzhan 'khor 'das su bzung ba'i snang zhen thams cad
NK014(pha)008:536: bar srid bsdu ba dang mngal 'byin gyi sgo nas
NK014(pha)008:537: sras su bskrun pa la bdag gi sras su gzhan
NK014(pha)008:538: bya ba dang / gzhan 'khor 'das su snang zhing
NK014(pha)008:539: bzung ba thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo
NK014(pha)008:541: bdag gi phung khams skye mched du 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad yig 'bru dang /
NK014(pha)008:542: mngal 'byin gyi bya bas bskrun pas gzhan gyi sras su bdag bya ba zhes gsungs shing /
NK014(pha)008:543: gnyis pa bskyed tshul dbang gis gzhan dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha tshogs su snang ba thams cad /
NK014(pha)008:544: bdag 'khor ba'i sems can gyi srid pa skye ba'i
NK014(pha)008:545: rim pa dang sgo bstun nas yab yumamanyama par sbyor
NK014(pha)008:546: ba dang / mngal 'byin gyi sgo nas bskyed pa
NK014(pha)008:547: la bdag gi sras su gzhan bya ba zhes dang
NK014(pha)008:548: ba dang / / bdag 'khor ba'i sems can de
NK014(pha)008:549: nyid gzhan dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mngon
NK014(pha)008:550: par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul lhun gyis grub
NK014(pha)008:551: pa'i cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs pa'i sgo nas /
NK014(pha)008:552: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo bskyed pa sangs rgyas kyi sras su bdag bya ba zhes gsungs la /
NK014(pha)008:554: snga ma rang gi rigs bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po'i che ba 'byin pa'i don dang /
NK014(pha)008:555: phyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rigs rgyun mi bcad pa'i dgos pa yin gsungs so //
NK014(pha)008:556: 'dir man ngag tu bstan pa rig 'dzin chen po pad+ma sam+b+ha'i dgongs pa ltar 'chad pa la /
NK014(pha)008:557: dang po sgo nga de smin nas sems can gyur pa bzhin /
NK014(pha)008:558: dang po bdag gi sras su gzhan bya ba la lnga /
NK014(pha)008:559: gzhan gyi sras su bdag bya ba la brgyad las /
NK014(pha)008:560: dang po la rgyu'i sa bon las gtso bo yab yum bskyed pa dang gcig /
NK014(pha)008:561: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bkug nas yum gyi mkha' ru bstim pa dang gnyis /
NK014(pha)008:562: sems can rnams bkug la sgrib pa sbyang ba dang gsum /
NK014(pha)008:563: gnyis su med pa la che ba brjod pa dang bzhi /
NK014(pha)008:564: mkha' nas bton la dkyil 'khor 'god pa dang lnga las /
NK014(pha)008:565: dang po ni bsgrub gzhi'i rnam par smin pa'i lus
NK014(pha)008:566: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis sbyangs nas srung ba'i 'khor
NK014(pha)008:567: lo'i steng gi bla bres kyi 'og nam mkha'i dbyings
NK014(pha)008:568: su rgyu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa yab yum bskyed pa
NK014(pha)008:569: ni / sgrub pa'i thabs kyi nges pa las ni sogs nas /
NK014(pha)008:570: gar dgu dang ldan par gyur zhes pa'i bar gyi bstan te /
NK014(pha)008:571: rgyu'i yi ge h'u yig mthing nag la sems dmigs
NK014(pha)008:572: pa brtan par gyur pa ni gzod de las h'u
NK014(pha)008:573: gis 'od zer nam mkha' gang bar 'phros nas don
NK014(pha)008:574: gnyis byas / mkha' khyab kyi h'u rnams gzhi'i h'u la thim /
NK014(pha)008:575: de 'od du zhu ba las rdo rje sngon po rtse dgu par gyur /
NK014(pha)008:576: yang de las 'od zer 'phros rang gzhan gyi don gnyis byas nas /
NK014(pha)008:577: tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK014(pha)008:578: rgyu'i he ru ka sku mdog smug nag cir yang
NK014(pha)008:579: 'gyur ba rdo rje dang dung khrag 'dzin pa 'bar
NK014(pha)008:580: ba'i gar dgu dang ldan pa gsal nas /
NK014(pha)008:581: gsal brtan gyi tshad mngon du ma gyur par bsgom /
NK014(pha)008:582: gnyis pa de'i mkha' gsang du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
NK014(pha)008:583: rnams spyan drangs nas bdag gi sras su bya ba'i
NK014(pha)008:585: rten gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:586: brten pa lha bsgom pa gnyis /
NK014(pha)008:588: gzhi dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:589: rgyu'i he ru ka'i thugs ka'i h'u las yum lnga'i sa bon /
NK014(pha)008:590: e yam ra sum kem ram rnams chad zhes pa nas /
NK014(pha)008:591: steng gi 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na /
NK014(pha)008:592: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsal gdab ste /
NK014(pha)008:593: de dag kyang phyi ltar na 'byung ba lnga /
NK014(pha)008:594: nang ltar na sems lnga'i rang bzhin /
NK014(pha)008:595: gsang ba ltar na yum lnga'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'o //
NK014(pha)008:596: zhes dag dran dang bcas te gsal bar bsgom /
NK014(pha)008:597: gnyis pa rten gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dngos ni /
NK014(pha)008:598: ri rab kyi steng du sogs nas /
NK014(pha)008:600: zhes pa'i bar gyis srung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte bar
NK014(pha)008:601: 'byung lnga rim brtsegs kyi ri rab steng du gzhal
NK014(pha)008:602: yas khang phyi nang rim pa gnyis kyi phyi b+han+d+ha
NK014(pha)008:603: 'am rin po che nang thod pas brtsigs pa'i gzhal
NK014(pha)008:607: dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung //
NK014(pha)008:608: zhes pa'i bar gyis gtso 'khor rang rang dang 'tshams pa'i gdan gsal btab /
NK014(pha)008:609: de nas gnyis pa lha bskyed pa nam mkhar gnas pa'i sogs nas /
NK014(pha)008:610: 'bras bu'i he ru kar gyur pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:611: zhes pa'i bar gyis bdag gi sras su bya ba'i sa bon bsgrub pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:612: gsum pa sems can rnams bkug nas sgrib pa sbyangs te /
NK014(pha)008:613: 'khor 'das ro gcig tu zhu ba dang /
NK014(pha)008:614: bzhi pa gnyis med kyi rang bzhin la che ba brjod pa rnams bstan te /
NK014(pha)008:615: nam mkhar gnas pa'i rgyu'i he ru ka skar mda'
NK014(pha)008:616: chad pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi tog gi rtse
NK014(pha)008:618: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gdan du 'khod pa las /
NK014(pha)008:619: de nyid skad cig gis dpal chen po sku mdog
NK014(pha)008:620: smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba dbu dang phyag zhabs
NK014(pha)008:621: stong khams kyi rdul snyed dang mnyam pas mtshon cha
NK014(pha)008:623: chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las khro mo
NK014(pha)008:624: dbyings phyug ma chen po mngon du phyung te hi
NK014(pha)008:625: hi zhes dgyes pa'i gdangs kyis yab la sras bskyed
NK014(pha)008:627: yab kyi zhal nas h'u h'u h'u bi shwa sogs
NK014(pha)008:628: kyi sngags brjod pa dang yab yum gnyis kyi sbyor
NK014(pha)008:629: mtshams nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las gleng gzhi
NK014(pha)008:630: ltar 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur khyab par khro
NK014(pha)008:631: bo 'chol ba mtshon cha sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs
NK014(pha)008:632: pa dpag tu med pa spros /
NK014(pha)008:633: ltas chen po bco lngas gdug pa can gyi tshogs rnams tshar bcad nas /
NK014(pha)008:634: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i khro bo rnams
NK014(pha)008:635: las rdo rje rigs kyi khro bo rnams rang la
NK014(pha)008:636: bstim pas sras kyi sa bon bskrun /
NK014(pha)008:637: gdug pa can gyi gtso bo byas te sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa sbyang /
NK014(pha)008:638: dwangs ma'i ngo bo sems nyid kyi ye shes bkug
NK014(pha)008:639: ste snga ma'i rang gi byang chub kyi sems dang
NK014(pha)008:640: gnyis med du 'dres pas 'khor 'das ro gcig tu
NK014(pha)008:641: zhu bas 'khor 'das gnyis med kyi rang bzhin la
NK014(pha)008:642: che ba'i nga rgyal brjod pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:643: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
NK014(pha)008:644: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /
NK014(pha)008:645: khro rgyal ye nas yin pa'i phyir //
NK014(pha)008:647: lnga pa de'i rkyen gyis 'bras bu'i rdo rje'i 'dzin
NK014(pha)008:648: par bzhengs pa'i mkha' gsang nas 'khor rnams bton te
NK014(pha)008:649: dkyil 'khor du 'god pa la bdag gi sras su
NK014(pha)008:651: sgrub thabs kyi 'bras bu'i he ru kar gyur pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:652: badz+ra sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u sogs nas /
NK014(pha)008:653: rgyan cha lugs gsal zhing gzi brjid dang ldan par gyur bar gyis bstan pas /
NK014(pha)008:654: de la nang gses su 'bras bu'i he ru ka
NK014(pha)008:655: zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog mthing nag char
NK014(pha)008:656: sprin ltar gnag pa nyi ma bye ba'i gzi byin
NK014(pha)008:657: 'bar ba / yum kro ti shwa r+ai ma sngo
NK014(pha)008:658: skya zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa gcer bu
NK014(pha)008:659: skra grol ba lang tshos sgeg pa'i rnam 'gyur can
NK014(pha)008:660: 'bar ba / / stong pa nyid dang snying rje
NK014(pha)008:661: chen po zung du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can du
NK014(pha)008:662: 'bar ba / / gsal zhing / de nas gnyis
NK014(pha)008:663: pa rigs bsdu basngara sngags kyis sprul pa spro ba'i
NK014(pha)008:664: rdo rje rigs kyi khro bo rnams gtso bo yab
NK014(pha)008:665: yum la bstim pa'i lhag ma /
NK014(pha)008:666: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
NK014(pha)008:669: las kyi rigs kyi khro bo bsam gyis mi khyab
NK014(pha)008:670: pa'i tshogs spros pa rnams phyogs so sor 'dus nas
NK014(pha)008:672: rigs bzhi'i he ru ka'i skur gyur nas phyogs bzhi'i
NK014(pha)008:673: 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhir rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs
NK014(pha)008:675: sgrub thabs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sogs nas g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
NK014(pha)008:676: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsal btab /
NK014(pha)008:677: gsum pa sras mo nyi shu mngal 'byin gyi sgo nas bskyed pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:678: de nas rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung sogs nas gzi brjid dang ldan par bsam gyi bar gyis bstan pas /
NK014(pha)008:679: rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung yab yum rnams rjes su chags par snyoms par zhugs te /
NK014(pha)008:680: dgyes pa'i bzhad sgra ha zhes brjod pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:681: byang chub sems kyi sprin las khro mo brgyad phrag lnga thon nas /
NK014(pha)008:682: slar yang rigs gcig tu bsdus te /
NK014(pha)008:683: 'khor lo'i grwa dang gru chad bzhi'i koo r+ai ma brgyad gsal la /
NK014(pha)008:684: de bzhin du he brgyad kyis gser khyams gyi phyogs mtshams brgyad du seng ha ma brgyad gsal btab /
NK014(pha)008:685: slar yang dgyes pa'i bzhad sgra phata ces brjod pa dang byang chub kyi sprin las sgo skyong bzhi /
NK014(pha)008:686: bzhi phrag lnga thon nas slar yang rigs bsdus te sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi gsal gdab pa ste /
NK014(pha)008:687: de dag ni yab yum gyi mkha' las ngo mtshar
NK014(pha)008:688: sras kyi dkyil 'khor yum gyi mkha' las bton te
NK014(pha)008:690: 'di dag ni bdag gi sras su gzhan bya ba
NK014(pha)008:691: la sa bcad lngar gsungs pa 'dir sgyu 'phrul khro
NK014(pha)008:692: bo dang sbyar te nang gi dbye ba rnams ni
NK014(pha)008:693: sgrub thabs kyi dkyus bzhin bshad pa dang sgrub thabs
NK014(pha)008:694: gzhan la'ang ci rigs pas sbyar du rung bar byas
NK014(pha)008:695: pa'o // gnyis pa gzhan sras kyi bya ba la /
NK014(pha)008:696: sgo nga smin pas sems can du gyur pa dang
NK014(pha)008:697: mthun par sbyang byed kyi gnyen po la brgyad de
NK014(pha)008:698: / gtso bo yab yum zhu ste rgyu'i sa bon du gyur pa dang gcig /
NK014(pha)008:699: de las yab yum du bskyed pa dang gnyis /
NK014(pha)008:700: yab kyi rtog tshogs las yi ge bskyed pa dang gsum /
NK014(pha)008:701: yum las 'od 'phros zhing lha la sras bskrun par gsol ba gdab pa dang bzhi /
NK014(pha)008:702: dkyil 'khor thams cad bdag yab yum la bstim pas ye shes par nga rgyal bskyed pa dang lnga /
NK014(pha)008:703: yab yum sbyor ba bya zhing mkha' ru dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang drug /
NK014(pha)008:704: bdag gi rtog pa zhe gnyis lha skur gyur te phyir gdon pa dang bdun /
NK014(pha)008:705: ye shes pa spyan drangs shing rgyas gdab pa dang brgyad las /
NK014(pha)008:706: dang po la zhal rgyun du gtso bo 'od du
NK014(pha)008:707: zhu nas thig le mthing nag gi gong bu sa
NK014(pha)008:708: bon phyag mtshan gyis mtshan par gyur pa'i sgo nga
NK014(pha)008:709: gnyis pa de 'bras bu'i rdo rje 'dzin par bzhengs
NK014(pha)008:710: pa sgong khyim brtol nas btsas pa sogs gsungs kyang
NK014(pha)008:711: / 'dir ni sgyu 'phrul rang gi dgongs pa ltar /
NK014(pha)008:712: snang ba'i zhen pa sbyong ba dang /
NK014(pha)008:713: stong pa'i 'dzin pa sbyang ba gnyis las /
NK014(pha)008:714: dang po snang zhen sbyong ba la'ang /
NK014(pha)008:715: bskul tshig ting nge 'dzin gsal gdab pa dang gsum las /
NK014(pha)008:716: dang po ni dkyus las gtso bo'i sogs nas /
NK014(pha)008:717: bdag sbyor cig gi bar gyis bstan te /
NK014(pha)008:718: gtso bo'i thugs ka nas rig pa'i kun tu bzang
NK014(pha)008:719: po sems dpa'i rgyun ldan rnam smin lus kyi rnam
NK014(pha)008:720: pa can rkang pa'i long bu sprad cing thal mo
NK014(pha)008:722: dkyil 'khor la bskor nas shar phyogs dga' ba chen po'i sgo nas me tog gtor nas //
NK014(pha)008:723: sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni //
NK014(pha)008:724: 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun //
NK014(pha)008:725: rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na //
NK014(pha)008:726: phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /
NK014(pha)008:728: gnyis pa ni sgrub thabs las /
NK014(pha)008:729: lha rnams kyi rjes su gnang ba sogs nas /
NK014(pha)008:730: gong bur 'bar bar gyis bstan pas /
NK014(pha)008:731: lha rnams kyis bdag la rjes su dgongs te thabs dang shes rab kyi 'od zer spros pas /
NK014(pha)008:732: bdag gi sems dang sems byung gi rtog pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:733: de las gyur pa'i rnam smin lus ngag sbyang /
NK014(pha)008:734: gzung 'dzin gnyis bral gyi rang bzhin gser zhun ma lta bu'i gong bur gyur pa la /
NK014(pha)008:735: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi
NK014(pha)008:736: 'od zer yi ge gsum gyi rnam pas bdag la
NK014(pha)008:737: bstim pas / gong bu nyid kyang de dang gnyis su med pa'i +aahmh'u gsum du gyur nas /
NK014(pha)008:739: ahmh'u la zhugs pa zla ba dang rlung dkyil la gnas par gyur pas /
NK014(pha)008:740: de rlung gis btegs pas bung ba me tog la lding ba ltar /
NK014(pha)008:741: dkyil 'khor thams cad la lan gsum bskor nas gtso
NK014(pha)008:742: bo'i thugs kar mda' 'phang ba ltar song ba'i rkyen
NK014(pha)008:743: gyis yab yum bde ba'i ros tshim nas byang chub
NK014(pha)008:744: kyi sems dang gnyis su med par zhu ba sku'i
NK014(pha)008:745: dbyibs brgyud / rdo rje'i lam nas yum gyi pad+mara
NK014(pha)008:746: thon pa 'od kyi gong bu gnas pa las gtso
NK014(pha)008:747: bo yab yum yang rjes su chags pa'i sbyor bas
NK014(pha)008:749: 'khor rnams kyang h'u ha he phata ces rang rang
NK014(pha)008:750: gi gsang sngags brjod pa'i rkyen gyi dbus kyi thig
NK014(pha)008:751: le la ro gcig tu gyur pa las gser zhun
NK014(pha)008:752: lta bu'i 'od kyi gong bur gyur par bsam /
NK014(pha)008:753: zhal rgyun du gtso 'khor rnams 'od du zhu ba
NK014(pha)008:754: rang gi kha dog can sa bon gyis mtshan pa
NK014(pha)008:755: rang rang gi gdan thog tu sgong khyim bkram pa
NK014(pha)008:758: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa //
NK014(pha)008:759: ye shes kyis ni rnam rtog kyang //
NK014(pha)008:760: gser zhun lta bu'i sems dag las //
NK014(pha)008:762: thugs kar thim nas sku yi dbyibs //
NK014(pha)008:763: rdo rje'i lam nas yum gyi mkhar //
NK014(pha)008:764: chos sku byang chub sems su gnas //
NK014(pha)008:765: lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra //
NK014(pha)008:766: h'u ha he phata ces byung ba //
NK014(pha)008:767: byang chub sems su gcig par thim //
NK014(pha)008:768: zhes shin tu gsal gdab bo //
NK014(pha)008:769: gnyis pa stong phyogs kyi zhen pa sbyong ba /
NK014(pha)008:770: de las 'bras bu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa yab yum
NK014(pha)008:771: skye mched rdzogs pa sgong khyim brtol ba ltar bskyed
NK014(pha)008:772: pa la / sgrub thabs las gtso bo yab yum bskyed pa /
NK014(pha)008:773: yan lag gi lha bsgom pa /
NK014(pha)008:774: 'khor spro ba gsum du bstan pa'i dang po ni /
NK014(pha)008:776: dbang phyug chen po'i ngo bor bzhugs pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK014(pha)008:778: 'di nas chos nyid stong pa'i dbyings nas yum gnam
NK014(pha)008:779: zhal dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma mthing skya dbu dgu
NK014(pha)008:780: phyag bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bzhengs te /
NK014(pha)008:781: bcom ldan 'das chos sku zhi ba'i dbyings las gzugs kyi skur bzhengs par bskul ba /
NK014(pha)008:782: ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol klong sogs kyis
NK014(pha)008:783: bskul ba gsan nas 'bras bu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa
NK014(pha)008:784: gsungs kyang / 'di ni h'u h'u zhes brjod /
NK014(pha)008:785: gdan steng gi 'od phung de nyid h'u zung gcig
NK014(pha)008:786: tu gyur pa 'od zer gyi 'phro 'dus don gnyis
NK014(pha)008:790: rdo rje rtse dgu pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:791: dril bu h'u yig gis mtshan par gyur pa las /
NK014(pha)008:792: slar yang 'od zer 'phro 'dus 'od du zhu ba las /
NK014(pha)008:793: sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u sogs gong bzhin du gtso bo bskyed pa'o //
NK014(pha)008:794: nang gses gnyis pa yan lag gi lha bskyed pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:795: rang gi thugs kar rin po che'i gur khyim sogs nas /
NK014(pha)008:796: at+ma ko&a ham bar gyis sems dpa' sum brtsegs su gsal ba la ye shes lnga'i dbang bskur /
NK014(pha)008:797: rdo rje gsum gyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
NK014(pha)008:798: rtsa ba'i gsum pa yab kyi rtog tshogs yi ge bskyed pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:799: sgrub thabs kyi gsum pa ngo mtshar sras kyi dkyil 'khor spro ba dang /
NK014(pha)008:800: dbang phyug ma nyer brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor spro ba
NK014(pha)008:801: gnyis kyi dang po sras spro ba la mkha' gsang
NK014(pha)008:804: sku bskyed pa dang gsum las /
NK014(pha)008:805: dang po ni sgrub thabs las /
NK014(pha)008:806: yab kyi gsang gnas sogs nas /
NK014(pha)008:807: bkra lam gyis gsal bar gyur gyi bar gyis bstan pas /
NK014(pha)008:808: 'das rtsa ba'i gsum pa dbang po yul la sad pa'i rtog tshogs yi ge sprin du spros nas /
NK014(pha)008:809: lha'i dkyil 'khor du sgrub pa'i yab kyi rtsa khams
NK014(pha)008:810: su h'u ha he phata kyi yi ge gsal ba
NK014(pha)008:811: dang / rtsa ba'i bzhi pa yum las 'od 'phros lha la gsol ba gdab pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:812: yab yum 'dod chags nga ro brjod //
NK014(pha)008:813: byin gnyis dam du rab 'khyud de //
NK014(pha)008:814: lag pa dam 'khyud ma mchu gzhib //
NK014(pha)008:815: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku //
NK014(pha)008:816: ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las //
NK014(pha)008:817: 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa //
NK014(pha)008:818: sku yi dbyig tu sras bskyed cig /
NK014(pha)008:819: ces gsol ba btab par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)008:820: rtsa ba'i lnga pa bka' brgyad ltar na /
NK014(pha)008:821: lha gnas so sor sa bon sgong khyim ltar bkram
NK014(pha)008:822: pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gtso bo'i shangs kyi rlung
NK014(pha)008:823: ring nang du rngubs pa dang lhan cig par sgong
NK014(pha)008:824: khyim thams cad shangs kyi rlung dang 'dres nas rang
NK014(pha)008:825: gi byang chub kyi sems la bstim par bsam nas
NK014(pha)008:826: / 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
NK014(pha)008:827: ye shes dkyil 'khor kun bsdus te //
NK014(pha)008:828: 'khor rnams thugs la bzhugs pa yi //
NK014(pha)008:829: shes rab ma ni dga' bar bya //
NK014(pha)008:831: rtsa ba'i drug pa mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs te
NK014(pha)008:832: phyag rgya bzhis snyoms par zhugs pa sgrub thabs gzhung
NK014(pha)008:833: gis dngos su bstan pa ste /
NK014(pha)008:834: chags pa lcags kyu zhes bya ste //
NK014(pha)008:835: pad+mara btsud pa zhags pa mo //
NK014(pha)008:836: kha 'gyed pa ni sgrog yin te //
NK014(pha)008:837: sgra grags pa ni dril bu'o //
NK014(pha)008:839: phyag rgya bzhi'i bgrod kyis snyoms par zhugs nas bde
NK014(pha)008:840: ba chen po'i sgra dang 'od zer gyis de bzhin
NK014(pha)008:841: gshegs pa thams cad bkug nas zhal du zhugs pas
NK014(pha)008:842: rjes su chags pa'i mes byang chub kyi sems su
NK014(pha)008:843: zhu bas sku'i dbyibs brgyud rdo rje'i lam nas yum
NK014(pha)008:844: gyi pad+mora lan gsum du spros pa las /
NK014(pha)008:846: chos sku byang chub sems su gnas //
NK014(pha)008:847: dang por bab pa gzhal med khang //
NK014(pha)008:848: gnyis pa gdan gyur gsum pa las //
NK014(pha)008:849: yab kyi rtog tshogs yi ger rdzogs //
NK014(pha)008:850: b+ha ga nyid du lha rnams bsam //
NK014(pha)008:851: zhes yi ge'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las /
NK014(pha)008:852: yum mkhar lha tshogs gsal gdab pa /
NK014(pha)008:853: lha so so'i gsang sngags brjod pa'i rkyen gyis sku yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa /
NK014(pha)008:854: de rnams dzahzhesa brjod pa tsam gyis yum gyi mkha'
NK014(pha)008:855: nas bton te mdun gyi nam mkha' bzhag pa la
NK014(pha)008:856: +aahmh'u gis sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs /
NK014(pha)008:857: 'od zer 'phro 'dus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrubs
NK014(pha)008:858: nas rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs par bsam pa'o
NK014(pha)008:859: // sgrub thabs 'dir ni byang chub kyi sems yum
NK014(pha)008:860: gyi mkhar lan gsum du spros pa'i dang pos thig
NK014(pha)008:861: // gdab / gnyis pas gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs /
NK014(pha)008:862: gsum pas gzhal yas khang der lha rnams kyi sa
NK014(pha)008:863: bon yig 'bru'i dkyil 'khor bkra lam gyis gsal bar
NK014(pha)008:864: bsam la / gnyis pa de'i don nan tan gyis gsal gdab pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:865: bsnyen pa dang ni nyer bsnyen dang //
NK014(pha)008:866: sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po //
NK014(pha)008:868: bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK014(pha)008:869: sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus pa //
NK014(pha)008:870: dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim //
NK014(pha)008:872: rtsa ba'i bdun pa bdag gi rtog tshogs lha gyur nas phyir gdon pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:873: gsum pa lhar bskyed pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:875: dz+wa la ni h'u phata zhes sogs nas /
NK014(pha)008:876: zhal phyir phyogs nas bzhengs pa'o //
NK014(pha)008:877: zhes pas bar gyis ngo mtshar sras kyii dkyil 'khor
NK014(pha)008:878: rigs lnga sogs sgo ma bzhi bcas mngal 'byin gyi
NK014(pha)008:880: gtso bo'i sngags brjod pa'i rkyen gyis /
NK014(pha)008:881: yum mkha' gzhal yas khang gi dbus kyi h'u gnyis
NK014(pha)008:882: badz+ra he ru ka yab yum gyi sku gyur pa
NK014(pha)008:883: / phata dzahzhesa pas mkha' las spros te mdun gyi
NK014(pha)008:884: nam mkhar bzhugs par gyur nas 'od zer spro bsdus
NK014(pha)008:885: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrubs /
NK014(pha)008:886: bdag nyid gtso bo yab yum la thim nas gnyis su med par gyur par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)008:887: de bzhin du rigs bzhi'i sa bon rnams rim pa
NK014(pha)008:888: bzhin rigs bzhi'i he ru ka yab yum gyi skur
NK014(pha)008:889: gyur pa / phata dzahs mkha' las bton te /
NK014(pha)008:890: phyogs bzhi'i gdan gyi nam mkhar bzhugs nas sngar bzhin
NK014(pha)008:891: 'od zer spro bsdu'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
NK014(pha)008:892: pa bsgrubs te / phyogs bzhi rang rang gi gdan steng du bzhugs pa gsal gdab /
NK014(pha)008:893: de bzhin du koo r+ai ma brgyad /
NK014(pha)008:895: sgo ma bzhi dang bcas pa mngal 'byin gyi cho gas bskyed nas /
NK014(pha)008:896: gnyis pa dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni /
NK014(pha)008:897: gleng gzhi'i skabs bzhin sras nyi shu bskyed pa'i yum
NK014(pha)008:898: du gyur pas mngal byin gyis mi bskyed par bdag
NK014(pha)008:899: nyid badz+ra he ru kar gsal ba'i thugs ka nas
NK014(pha)008:901: rang sngags brjod pa'i rkyen gyis khyams phyi ma'i phyogs bzhir drug drug dang /
NK014(pha)008:902: sgo bzhir re re rang rang gi stan la 'khod
NK014(pha)008:903: par gsal gdab pa ste lha thams cad kyi srog
NK014(pha)008:904: gi gor ye shes sems dpa' dwangs ma'i srog yig
NK014(pha)008:905: bcas pas mtshen par gsal nges par bya'o //
NK014(pha)008:906: rtsa ba'i brgyad pa phyag rgya bzhis bcings nas ye shes pa spyan drangs shing rgyas gdab pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:908: gsal gdab pa la sngags dang tshigs kyis gsal gdab pa'i phyi ma la che ba bskyed pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:909: gsal gdab dngos gsungs pa rnams kyis mtshon pas h'u ha he nas /
NK014(pha)008:911: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK014(pha)008:912: phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyas chings kyis bcings pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:913: de ltar gsal ba'i lha tshogs rnams kyi sku mdog
NK014(pha)008:914: phyag mtshan rgyan cha lugs rnams la gsal snang thon
NK014(pha)008:915: pa ni sku phyag rgya chen po /
NK014(pha)008:918: lha rnams kyi srog gi gor rang 'dra'i ye shes
NK014(pha)008:919: sems dpa' dwangs ma'i srog yig dang bcas pa gsal
NK014(pha)008:920: ba / brjod pa chos rgya ni /
NK014(pha)008:921: lha rnams kyi rang rang gi bskyed sngags brjod pa rnams yin la /
NK014(pha)008:923: dkrol ba las rgya gnyis 'og gi phyag rgya'i mchod pa'i skabs kyi /
NK014(pha)008:925: rnam par grol ba mtshon pa'i phyir //
NK014(pha)008:926: dbus kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni //
NK014(pha)008:927: sogs kyis mtshon pa'i bca' ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK014(pha)008:928: dkrol ba las kyi phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par gsal ba rnams yin no //
NK014(pha)008:929: de dag la che ba bskyed pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:931: sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas //
NK014(pha)008:932: rnam grol rim par thob 'gyur na //
NK014(pha)008:933: dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs pa //
NK014(pha)008:934: smos ci dgos te de nyid yin //
NK014(pha)008:935: zhes pas phyag rgya bzhis rdo rje 'chang gi dngos
NK014(pha)008:936: grub sgrub pa la mi bslu bar byin gyis brlabs
NK014(pha)008:937: pa'i don la nges pa'i blo bzhag go //
NK014(pha)008:938: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis bcings shing gsal gdab nas
NK014(pha)008:939: ye shes pa spyan drangs shing sku gsung thugs dang
NK014(pha)008:940: ye shes lnga'i rgyas gdab pa ni /
NK014(pha)008:941: sgrub thabs kyi gsum pa las kyi rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nang gses drug gi /
NK014(pha)008:945: rig pa'i me tog dor ba /
NK014(pha)008:946: dngos grub bskul te bstim pa rnams kyis bstan pas /
NK014(pha)008:947: sgrub thabs kyi dkyus bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK014(pha)008:948: de nas snga dro las byang rgyas pa btang nas bsnyen pa'i mgo nas lha'i gsal snang la bslab /
NK014(pha)008:949: thun phyi ma gsum la sems bskyed nas lha bskyed rgyas par btang /
NK014(pha)008:950: spyan 'dren bzhugs gsol gnyis gzhung bzhin la /
NK014(pha)008:951: mchod pa kun bzang bzhi bsnol dang /
NK014(pha)008:952: sman raka gtor gsum sngags tsam dang /
NK014(pha)008:953: bstod pa gzhung bzhin du btang /
NK014(pha)008:956: dam bca' ba gsum bzhag kyang chog la /
NK014(pha)008:957: bsnyen pa'i mgor lha'i gsal snang la bslab pa'i tshul /
NK014(pha)008:958: khrid thang mdun mchod pa mtshon tsam bsham /
NK014(pha)008:959: rang nyid de'i mdun du nye ring 'tshams par 'dug nas /
NK014(pha)008:960: lha sku la mig gis blta zhing /
NK014(pha)008:961: yang mig btsum nas de 'dra yid la i 'char blta nas sgom tshul zhi ba'i bsnyen yig ltar /
NK014(pha)008:964: dag dran la bslab pa rnams 'dir blangs /
NK014(pha)008:965: khyad par khro bo la spyan dbus mar sems bzhin bslab ste /
NK014(pha)008:966: badz+ra he ru ka sku mdog mthing nag dbyar gyi char sprin ltar gnag pa /
NK014(pha)008:967: nyi ma bye ba'i gzi byin 'bar ba /
NK014(pha)008:968: dbu gsum gyi g.yas g.yon gnyis la mgrin pa dang bcas par gsal ba las /
NK014(pha)008:969: mgo gsum lhan du 'byar ba 'dra ba zhig min pa /
NK014(pha)008:970: g.yas zhal dkar la bzhad pa /
NK014(pha)008:971: g.yon zhal dmar la gshe ba /
NK014(pha)008:972: dbus mthing nag drag po khros pa'i nyams can /
NK014(pha)008:973: zhal re rer dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum
NK014(pha)008:974: dang ldan pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal gdangs shing
NK014(pha)008:975: / mche ba bzhi bzhi gtsigs pa /
NK014(pha)008:977: rdo rje'i gad mos sa gsum g.yo ba /
NK014(pha)008:978: khro gnyer bsdus pa'i shangs nas mi bzad pa'i h'u sgra 'byin pa /
NK014(pha)008:979: rdzi smin sma ra las 'bar ba'i me 'khyogs par 'phen pa /
NK014(pha)008:980: sku che zhing yan lag rags pa lang tsho rgyas pa'i 'gyur bag can /
NK014(pha)008:981: rdo rje'i ba spus gtams pa /
NK014(pha)008:982: de yang chags nyams kyis sgeg pa /
NK014(pha)008:984: rmongs nyams kyis mi sdug ba ste sku'i gar gsum /
NK014(pha)008:985: ha ha hi hi la sogs pa bzhad pa'i gad mo 'byin pa /
NK014(pha)008:986: zungs shig rgyob cig la sogs pa gshe ba /
NK014(pha)008:987: de dag kyang 'brug stong dus gcig la ldir ba'am /
NK014(pha)008:988: thog stong dus gcig la lhung ba lta bu'i sgra
NK014(pha)008:989: gdangs dang ldan pa drag shul te gsung gi gar
NK014(pha)008:990: gsum / rmongs pa'i 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin pa'i snying rje dang /
NK014(pha)008:991: ma rungs pa'i sems can khro bo'i 'dul bas rngam pa /
NK014(pha)008:992: thams cad chos nyid du ro mnyam par gzigs pa'i
NK014(pha)008:993: zhi ba ste thugs kyi gar gsum dang ldan pa
NK014(pha)008:994: / de ltar gar gyi nyams dgus rab tu rgyas
NK014(pha)008:995: pa me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na zhabs bzhi g.yas
NK014(pha)008:996: brkyang g.yon bskum pa'i gyad chen po'i stabs kyis rang
NK014(pha)008:997: gi gdan la rol pa de ltar gsal thebs par
NK014(pha)008:999: de yang lha snang spyi dang bye brag rgyan phyag
NK014(pha)008:1000: mtshan sogs la sems 'dzin tshul zhi ba'i bsnyen yig
NK014(pha)008:1001: ltar lags / de ltar bsgom pas mdun gyi lha
NK014(pha)008:1002: sku la gsal snang legs par thon pa na gzod
NK014(pha)008:1003: de rang gi lus la spos te bsgom pas nam
NK014(pha)008:1004: zhig gsal brtan gyi tshad brgyad 'byung ste /
NK014(pha)008:1005: de yang gsal ba'i tshad bzhi ni /
NK014(pha)008:1006: de ltar lha bsgom yang sku'i snang cha spyan gyi
NK014(pha)008:1007: dkar nag tshun chad ma 'dres pa gsal bas sal
NK014(pha)008:1008: le / de yang rig pa'i gsal ngar dang bral
NK014(pha)008:1009: ba'i bying nyams can ma yin pa rig pa gsal
NK014(pha)008:1010: stong seng bag dang bcas pa'i rig pa ngar dang
NK014(pha)008:1012: bsgom pa'i lha de dag kyang sems med bem po'i
NK014(pha)008:1013: rnam pa 'ja' tshon lta bur ma yin par ba
NK014(pha)008:1014: spu'i khung bu dang dbu skra'i nyag ma tshun chad
NK014(pha)008:1015: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis zin
NK014(pha)008:1016: pas / dbang shes dwangs pa'i yon tan brgya phrag
NK014(pha)008:1017: tu 'char zhing bkra khrig gis bzhugs pas na lhag
NK014(pha)008:1018: pas / ge / de lta bu'i sku de yang
NK014(pha)008:1019: de ltar yin no ba dang yod do tsam gyis
NK014(pha)008:1020: rjes dpag gi blo rtog ma yin par yid ngor
NK014(pha)008:1021: na mngon sum lta bu bkra lhang nge 'char ba
NK014(pha)008:1022: lhang nge ba ste gsal ba'i tshad bzhi /
NK014(pha)008:1023: dpal sprul rin po che bka' drin can gyis khong
NK014(pha)008:1024: gis rta thog 'bud dus zhabs g.yon pa yob chen
NK014(pha)008:1025: nang bzhag nas / g.yas yob gnon bar du bka'
NK014(pha)008:1026: brgyad bdun brgya nyer lnga'i lha tshogs rnams sku mdog
NK014(pha)008:1027: phyag mtshan rgyan cha lugs rnams ma 'dres par gsal
NK014(pha)008:1028: nang bzhag nas / nus kyang / da dung 'di
NK014(pha)008:1029: bskyed rim mtshan nyid pa ci yin snang med khyed
NK014(pha)008:1030: rnams kyis bskyed rim rtsis med du ma 'dor bar
NK014(pha)008:1031: gsal brtan gyi tshad brgyad ma byung bar bsgom dgos
NK014(pha)008:1032: nang bzhag nas / nus kyang / zhes / bdag
NK014(pha)008:1033: gi bla ma bka' drin can la gsungs pas de
NK014(pha)008:1034: ltar gsal brtan gyi tshad mngon du ma gyur bar
NK014(pha)008:1035: nang bzhag nas / nus kyang / zhes / bsgom dgos / brtan pa 'i tshad bzhi ni /
NK014(pha)008:1036: le lo la sogs pa phyi'i skyon gyis mi g.yo /
NK014(pha)008:1037: rab rib mog mog la sogs 'gyur ba'i skyon gyis mi 'gyur /
NK014(pha)008:1038: de yang yun thung ngu tsam ma yin par nyin
NK014(pha)008:1039: mtshan du mnyam par bzhag kyang rnam rtog phra mos
NK014(pha)008:1040: kyang mi bardzi ba gsal ba mngona para mi 'gyur
NK014(pha)008:1041: ba / sku mdog dang zhal phyag dang byon bzhugs
NK014(pha)008:1042: dang 'od zer spro bsdu'i rnam pa la sogs ji
NK014(pha)008:1043: ltar bsgom yang de ltar 'byung ba ni cira yanga
NK014(pha)008:1044: basgyur du btub pa ste brtan pa'i tshad bzhi'o //
NK014(pha)008:1045: lar lha bsgom pa'i dus gsal zhing bzhag pas /
NK014(pha)008:1046: bzhag tu btub pa ni yon tan yin cing /
NK014(pha)008:1047: bsgom pa'i dus ha cang mi gsal zhing /
NK014(pha)008:1048: ma bsgom na lha sku'i rnam pa yid ngor lam lam gsal ba dang /
NK014(pha)008:1049: gsal ba'i de nyid la zhen pa yod na skyon
NK014(pha)008:1050: yin pas gsal snang goms nas bsdu rim la byang
NK014(pha)008:1051: dgos pa gnad du che bas /
NK014(pha)008:1052: deng sang phal che bas thun rjes ma ma gtogs bsdu rim mi byed pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:1053: yang dus rgyun dkyil 'khor gsum dang ma bral bar
NK014(pha)008:1054: byed dgos pas bsdu rim mi byed zer ba sogs
NK014(pha)008:1055: ni bskyed rdzogs kyi gnad thun mong ma yin pa'i
NK014(pha)008:1056: phyogs tsam yang mi shes pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:1057: gya nom lhar zhen gyi mtshan 'dzin la skyon du
NK014(pha)008:1058: ma mthong ba'i rmongs pa'i rang rtags zangs mar bstan
NK014(pha)008:1059: par zad do // des na bsdu rim ni 'chi
NK014(pha)008:1060: ba'i bag chags sbyong zhing chos sku'i rten 'brel bsgrigs
NK014(pha)008:1061: par zad do // pa dang / sgyu lus 'od
NK014(pha)008:1062: gsal du bsdu ba'i rdzogs rim gyi lam gyi smin
NK014(pha)008:1064: spyir rdo rje theg pa'i lam gyi yon tan thams
NK014(pha)008:1065: cad rdo rje'i lus la gnad du bsnun nas rtsa
NK014(pha)008:1066: rlung thig le dbu mar 'dus pa'i byed pa las
NK014(pha)008:1067: skye ba sha stag yin zhing /
NK014(pha)008:1068: des don gyi 'od gsal rang rgyud la bskyed cing
NK014(pha)008:1069: 'byung ba'i rgyud rim las rtags bcu'i snang ba 'char
NK014(pha)008:1070: zhing rang bzhin gyi thim rim la snang gsum gyi
NK014(pha)008:1071: 'od gsal shar ba'i klong du tha mal gyi 'khrul
NK014(pha)008:1072: snang thams cad nub nas snang gsum 'od gsal du
NK014(pha)008:1073: thim pa'i gnas skabs na chos nyid spros pa dang
NK014(pha)008:1074: bral ba'i ye shes 'char ba nges pa can yin
NK014(pha)008:1076: rmi lam gyi dge sbyor la brtson par 'dod pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:1077: nyin mo rlung sems dbu mar 'dus pa'i thabs la spro ba yod pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:1078: thun mong ma yin pa'i rdzogs rim sgyu lus dang 'od gsal mngon du byed 'dod pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:1079: de las tha mal gyi lus rten dor nas slob
NK014(pha)008:1080: pa'i zung 'jug gi skur bzhengs par 'dod pa dang
NK014(pha)008:1081: / mthar thug ma rig bag chags kyi yid lus
NK014(pha)008:1082: kyang 'od gsal du bsdus te mi slob pa'i zung
NK014(pha)008:1083: 'jug gi go 'phang mngon du byed par 'dod pa
NK014(pha)008:1084: / dang / gal te tshe 'dir ma grol kyang
NK014(pha)008:1085: bar do dang po'i 'od gsal chos sku'i dgongs pa
NK014(pha)008:1086: la mnyam par bzhag nas zung 'jug gi longs spyod
NK014(pha)008:1087: rdzogs skur bzhengs par 'dod pa rnams kyis ni /
NK014(pha)008:1088: bskyed rim gyi rjes su bsdu rim la do gal bya dgos so //
NK014(pha)008:1089: de ltar ma yin par yi dam gyi gsal snang
NK014(pha)008:1090: dang spro bsdus dmigs pa tsam la brten nas 'dre
NK014(pha)008:1091: 'dul dang srung skyob kyi phrin las phran bu re
NK014(pha)008:1092: sgrub par 'dod pa rnams la ni mu stegs byed
NK014(pha)008:1093: dang thun mong pa'i gsal snang dang nga rgyal des
NK014(pha)008:1094: chog go // nang bsdu rim ma goms rjes su lha bsgom na /
NK014(pha)008:1095: 'di dag gi skabs su bka' brgyad kyi rgyud gsang ba yongs rdzogs dang /
NK014(pha)008:1096: he ru ka gal po'i rgyud rnams dpang por bzhag ste brtsad pas chog go //
NK014(pha)008:1097: des lha snang la brtan pa khyad par thob pa'o //
NK014(pha)008:1098: bsnyen pa ci tsam btang ba'i phyed yan chad nas
NK014(pha)008:1099: zhi ba'i skabs ltar rdzogs rim la bslab par bya'o
NK014(pha)008:1100: // de yang bskyed rim la a 'thas shing /
NK014(pha)008:1101: rdzogs rim la mi mos pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:1102: rdzogs rim gyi stong skad la zhen nas bskyed rim bcos ma'i lam du gol nas /
NK014(pha)008:1103: bskyed rdzogs ya bral du nyams su len par 'dod
NK014(pha)008:1104: pa dag ni sangs rgyas chos gzugs gnyis kyi thun
NK014(pha)008:1105: mong ma yin pa'i rgyu sgyu lus dang 'od gsal
NK014(pha)008:1106: gnyis la skur pa btab pa'i rnam smin ngan song
NK014(pha)008:1107: las 'gro sa med pa rgyu 'bras nges pa tshad
NK014(pha)008:1109: de nas bsnyen pa btang ba 'dzab khang dbye ba sogs zhi ba'i skabs ltar la /
NK014(pha)008:1110: bsnyen pa rgyas pa'i dbang du na /
NK014(pha)008:1111: gtso bo yab yum gyi rtsa sngags dang ru lu sbrel ba bye ba gcig /
NK014(pha)008:1112: 'khor rigs bzhi'i khrag 'thung la de'i bzhi cha /
NK014(pha)008:1113: koo seng sgo ma dbang phyug rnams la de'i bzhi cha /
NK014(pha)008:1114: bsdus pa'i dbang du byas na gtso bo yab yum la ru lu sbrel ba 'bum phrag bzhi /
NK014(pha)008:1116: koo seng sgo ma dbang phyug nyer brgyad bcas rang sngags dang ru lu sbrel ba khri re re /
NK014(pha)008:1118: gtso bo yab yum sngags rkyang pa 'bum phrag bzhi /
NK014(pha)008:1119: de bzhin du rigs bzhi 'bum phrag re /
NK014(pha)008:1121: ru lu rkyang pa bye ba gcig bcas lam mos sgom pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
NK014(pha)008:1122: lam nges rdzogs kyi dbang du na /
NK014(pha)008:1123: rtags dus grangs kyi bsnyen pas phye ba'i rab 'bring
NK014(pha)008:1124: tha ma'i rtags rdzogs kyi bar du bya bar gsungs
NK014(pha)008:1125: so // thun 'jug thams cad bstod bshags ye shes bsdu ba dang bcas pa grub pa dang /
NK014(pha)008:1126: thun mtshams kyi bya ba nyer bsdu go bsgo lus srung man chad gzhung bzhin du bya'o //
NK014(pha)008:1127: 'dir ni sgru 'phrul khro bo'i sgos chos rnams bshad pa'i khyad par ma gtogs /
NK014(pha)008:1128: sbyor dngos rjes kyi bya ba phal cher zhi ba'i
NK014(pha)008:1129: bsnyen yig las shes par bya dgos pa kho na'o
NK014(pha)008:1131: mdo sgyu sems gsum rgyud dang legs bshad gzhung //
NK014(pha)008:1132: mtshan tsam thos pa'i bsod nams bsam 'das na //
NK014(pha)008:1133: 'chad rtsod rtsom pas gtan la dbab pa 'di //
NK014(pha)008:1134: bskal mang bsod nams mthu las yin nam snyam //
NK014(pha)008:1135: rgyal ba'i bstan pa snyigs mar gzim la nye //
NK014(pha)008:1136: rang 'dod 'byung bya'i dga' ston shar ba'i dus //
NK014(pha)008:1137: thos bsam bsgom pa nges pa'i blo dman yang //
NK014(pha)008:1138: skal ldan don mthun 'ga' la phan blos bris //
NK014(pha)008:1139: ma rtogs log par rtog pa'i nyes pa'i cha //
NK014(pha)008:1140: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro srung ma dang //
NK014(pha)008:1141: chos kyi spyan ldan 'phags mgon rnams kyi drung //
NK014(pha)008:1142: thog med bsags pa'i sdig dang lhan cig 'chag /
NK014(pha)008:1143: 'dis thob dge ba nyin byed 'bum brdal bas //
NK014(pha)008:1144: snga 'gyur ring lugs pad tshal rgyas pa dang //
NK014(pha)008:1145: grub gnyis yid bzhin 'jo ba'i dga' ston gyis //
NK014(pha)008:1146: ma lus skye dgu'i re ba skong bar shog /
NK014(pha)008:1147: ces pa'ang sgyu 'phrul khro bo'i bsnyen pa ji ltar btang ba'i tshul /
NK014(pha)008:1148: rang dgon mchog sprul thub bstan bshad sgrub rgya mtshos
NK014(pha)008:1149: dngos dang yi ge'i lam nas snga phyir bskul ba
NK014(pha)008:1150: dang / rgya ra mkhan po mgon pos kyang ched du bskul ba'i ngor /
NK014(pha)008:1151: dpal kahthoga pa chen po si tu chos kyi rgya
NK014(pha)008:1152: mtsho'i bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba pad+ma las 'brel rtsal
